Ninja AF101

Reliable air fryer with crisp results and dishwasher-safe basket.

Specifications

  • Power: 1550 W

  • Controls: Digital

FAQ

Does the Ninja AF101 cook evenly?

Yes, it delivers consistent crisping when food is placed in a single layer.
